actions.desc: The desert troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.desc: The desert troll has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in desert terrain.
special_abilities.name: Desert Camouflage

special_abilities.desc: If the desert troll burrows at least 15 feet straight toward a creature, it can burst out of the ground, harming those above it. Each creature in its space when it erupts must make a DC 16 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage, is pushed out of the troll’s space, and is knocked prone. On a success, the creature takes half the damage and is pushed out of the troll’s space, but isn’t knocked prone.
special_abilities.name: Erupt

special_abilities.desc: The desert troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
special_abilities.name: Keen Smell

special_abilities.desc: The troll regains 10 hp at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the troll’s next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.
special_abilities.name: Regeneration

special_abilities.desc: The desert troll takes 1 acid damage for every 5 feet it moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.
special_abilities.name: Water Susceptibility
